message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you halfway!
I'll meet you halfway, but I want a bit more!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a bit less!
I'll compromise again, let's find a middle ground!
I'll meet you at the middle, but I'm not giving up!
I'm not giving up either! Let's try again!
